name: led
content: The `led` is an object representing the red LED next to the USB port. Internally this LED is connected to pin 13 of the Circuit Playground. ### Properties and Methods * `led.on()` - Turn the red LED on * `led.off()` - Turn the red LED off * `led.toggle()` - Alternate between turning the LED on and off * `led.blink()` - Blink at a given rate * `led.pulse()` - Pulse at a given rate

examples.name: Blink: Blink Buttons
examples.description: Changes the rate of how fast the button blinks depending on which button is pressed.
